text: Isthmia may refer to: * Isthmia (ancient city) at the east side of the Isthmus of Corinth, Greece * The ancient Isthmian Games, held in the city Isthmia * the Temple of Isthmia in the city Isthmia * Isthmia, Corinthia, a village in the municipal unit Loutraki-Perachora, Corinthia, Greece, near ancient Isthmia * Isthmia (genus), a genus of diatom in the Coscinodiscophyceae subclass
title: Isthmia
